contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 1, 2005 D West Wales BBA Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium - Ynyshir. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
Feb. 28, 2012, 10:54 p.m. July 4, 2020, 8:29 a.m.
1 Ynyshir Band Kerry Bowden Dimensions
2 Lewis Merthyr Band Lyndon Price Variations on Laudate Dominum
3 Blaenavon Town Band Alun Hathaway Dimensions
4 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett Facets of Glass
5 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Glyn Davies Diversions for Brass Band
6 Severn Tunnel Band Stewart Crawford The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
7 Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins Variations on Laudate Dominum
